term.title: catalytic hydrogenolysis

item.text: Ordinarily, a reaction in which A + H2 gives B. [image: generic saturated organic compound] [image: generic organic products from hydrogenolysis] For example, [image: hydrogenation reaction (propane + hydrogen)] [image: hydrogenation reaction (toluene + hydrogen)] [image: hydrogenation reaction (butane + hydrogen)] The term may also be used for cleavage of bonds other than A, e.g. [image: hydrogenation reaction (benzyl acetate + hydrogen)] [image: hydrogenation reaction (phenylmethanamine + hydrogen)]
